extensionDescription.message: Save web highlights to Notion in one click. Admin access required

setup.title.description: Heading for setup page in options.

setup.connectStepNumber.description: Step number for the setup step of getting the Notion API token.

setup.connectStepLabel.description: Short title for the setup step of getting the Notion API token.

setup.connectTitle.description: Full title for the setup step of getting the Notion API token.

setup.connectDescription.message: Exnota needs permission to save to Notion. This is done by creating an integration, which generates a token that you save here. The integration allows the two applications to communicate safely.
setup.connectDescription.description: Description of why the Connect setup step is needed.

setup.connectAdminReminder.message: Reminder: This step can only be completed by an Admin of a Notion workspace. This is currently a Notion requirement.
setup.connectAdminReminder.description: Reminder bubble text explaining that the user needs to be an Admin for this extension to work.

setup.connectCreateIntegrationTitle.description: Heading for steps getting the user to click the New Integration button in Notion.

setup.selectStepNumber.description: Step number for the setup step of choosing a base page in which all highlights will be saved.

setup.selectStepLabel.description: Short title for the setup step of choosing a base page in which all highlights will be saved.

setup.selectTitle.description: Full title for the setup step of choosing a base page in which all highlights will be saved.

setup.startStepNumber.description: Step number for the setup step of getting started highlighting after all other steps are done.

setup.startStepTitle.description: Short title for the setup step of getting started highlighting after all other steps are done.

setup.startTitle.description: Full title for the setup step of getting started highlighting after all other steps are done.
